name: Maki Beast
description:
Maki Beast is a procedural generated action game set in a unique world based on the American Midwest and Native American art. 

Use the objects around you in interesting ways in order to defeat the enemies. There's three distinct worlds with different enemies, objects, and a final boss fight. I had an amazing time creating it and I hope you can enjoy it as well!

Game by Thomas Keys. Music by MintyFreshThoughts
